## Restock Recommendation:

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 35,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand with a buffer and take advantage of the discount while minimizing surplus. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  Matches the player's planned order size. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  ~2.5 days (based on average demand) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  ~8 days (ensures coverage for the next 5 days and accounts for lead time) |
| Comments                          |  Ordering 35,000 units allows for a buffer to accommodate potential demand variability and ensures the player benefits from the discount. It also maintains a healthy stock turnover rate, minimizing the risk of inventory obsolescence. |
